page.title: 14EMPLOYMENT
page.content: As yet the{high unemployment}figures experienced in other areas has not affected this area.There has been a {dramatic transformation}in the type of employment residents have.During the years between the wars the greatest employment was connected with the land.Today a combination of mechanization and mobilisation has altered the situation. The local{farms}now require{fewer } {workers}and car ownership has meant workers can travel further to employment. An increasing number of residents work in{industry or businesses}based further afield.Some even commute to London daily. Although{farming}is still the{major} {employment}in the area the percntage of residents working on the land is low.
